Color cube

Drag to move the cube.

This is a 3D color representation of a picture I have shot in La Barceloneta, the harbour of Barcelona.

I will try to keep improving this as it is quite useful when you are working in image processing. The code could probably be faster although I already reduced the color quantization to 64 instead of 256. I also remove redundant colors so that the number of points to draw is smaller. The GUI could be improved by adding transparency as a function of the point density, displaying info such as stats, view angle, etc. Iâ€™ll add a link to the photo soon. Mouse wheel should (un)zoom however, it only scrolls the page. Looking for a way to keep focus on the canvas while the mouse is on it. Any tip?
